member.name: M:TranslateWebApp.Controllers.TranslateController.translate(System.Object)
member.remarks:
Example request:
POST /Todo { "TargetLanguage": "ru", "SourceLanguage": "en", "Input": [ "It is raining", "I am happy", "London is the capital of Great Britain" ] }

member.name: M:TranslateWebApp.TranslationGRPCService.BindService(Grpc.Core.ServiceBinderBase,TranslateWebApp.TranslationGRPCService.TranslationGRPCServiceBase)
member.summary: Register service method with a service binder with or without implementation. Useful when customizing the service binding logic. Note: this method is part of an experimental API that can change or be removed without any prior notice.
member.param: Service methods will be bound by calling AddMethod on this object.
An object implementing the server-side handling logic.
